snippet: Northwestern University has plans to demolish an unused building in Chicago, but preservationists say it is a historic landmark.
abstract: Northwestern University in Chicago has plans to demolish the former Prentice Women's Hospital building, designed by architect Bertrand Goldberg and completed in 1975, but preservationists say it is a historic landmark; university wants to build a medical research center on the site.
lead_paragraph: Northwestern University has plans to demolish an unused building in Chicago, but preservationists say it is a historic landmark.

headline.seo: Northwestern and Coalition Debate Use of Prentice Building in Chicago
headline.main: Landmark for Many Is Opportunity for University
headline.print_headline: Landmark For Many Is Opportunity For University
